name: Defender Myths - Legendary
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Defender Myths: New Era! Evil forces are looking for the energy core of World Tree in the Azure Dragon City. Only you can save the city from danger, recruit your team of heroes to fight against the dark forces, and join millions of players into mysterious adventures! There are hundreds of different heroes waiting for you, extreme battle experience, interesting offline farming, and various ways to develop your heroes! The door of a mysterious world is slowly opening for you, are you ready for this?

Game Features

※An Idle Game Requires Little Operation※
Send out your team of heroes, they will fight for you automatically!
Acquire Epic Equipments and Legendary Heroes just by waiting!
Get amazing prizes even when you are offline!

※Develop with multiple elements, Create the strongest team!※！
200 heroes in 5 different races, hundreds of unique abilities!
Collect high quality equipment, level-up, upgrade and evolve your hero, brings satisfaction by developing your heroes with multiple elements
Use the easiest method to play the game, and experience the best fun you will enjoy in the game!

※Various and Excellent Contents※
Idle style, battle, equipment collection, sending heroes, and developing them!
Tower of the Dream, Region Challenge, Arena, and Guild!
More Excellent contents waiting for you!

※Exciting Guild Experiences!※
Challenge powerful Guild Boss!
Contest with other guilds for the ownership of Skyland!
Create the best Guild with other players, and become the legends in the server!


Conclusion: Fight monsters and level-up both online and offline, abundant rewards even you are offline. Play the game with ease and extreme experience. You can even upgrade and get experience while you are eating and sleeping!
